data.persona: I have the best family on earth.  My parents are incomparable!  I am blessed to have a close knit family.
data.description:
You are in the Gathering room.
The gathering room is small, but comfortable. There are many seats for people to rest in. They are made of straw and covered with homespun blankets. There is a small table.
There's a Quill, a small table, a seat, and a blanket here.
The clergyman is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Clothes.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the clergyman
data.mid_motivation: I want to have a meeting with the clergyman today
data.long_motivation: I hope to work as an apprentice for the clergyman for some months
